pageProduct.name: Alya Skin Native Berries Moisturiser 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hydrates and moisturises all skin types. Vegan and cruelty free.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of direct sunlight. Avoid contact with eyes and mouth area. If irritations occurs, cease use. 

Common Uses

Packed full of beneficial ingredients for your skin such as macadamia oil and shea butter. For best results, use after Alya Skin Pink Clay Mask. Safe for sensitive skin.

Ingredients

Aqua, Prunus amygdalus dulcis (Sweet almond) oil, Caprylic/Capric triglyceride, Cetearyl alcohol, Glyceryl stearate, Ethyl oleate, Glycerine, Macadamia ternifolia (Macadamia) seed oil, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea) butter, Theobroma cacao (Cacao) seed butter, Ceteareth 20, Punica granatum pericarp (Pomegranate) extract, Tasmannia lanceolata (Pepperberry) fruit extract, Syzygium luehmannii (Riberry) fruit extract, Kunzea pomifera (Mutries) fruit extract, Hydrolized jojoba ester, Pelargonium roseum (Geranium rose) stem oil, Tocopherol, Phenethyl alcohol, Caprylyl glycol, Lactic acid, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Citral, Farnesol.

Directions

Apply the moisturiser to the T-Zone area of your face on a DAILY BASIS. For best results, use after the Alya Skin Pink Clay Face Mask.
